text: Short-Term Intensive Serial: After School Go! Go!

<line-height=80%><size=80%>Today, Komiya, Saijo, and Arisugawa embark on
a cycling adventure! They dash through the fresh greenery,
what will the three of them feel?

It was my first time riding this type,
but... I could ride so fast!

Oh, it was way cooler and easier to ride
than my usual commuter bike!

Yes, it was reliable
and I think it was the best partner!

With such an amazing partner and
such beautiful scenery, during the photoshoot...
I'm sure we've captured some really great photos!
Yes, I can say that with confidence!
